title: Bug 6656 - Close button misplacement on view resize
description: The close button moves down when the view is resized smaller, causing a usability concern.
OB: When the view is resized smaller, the close button shifts to a position below its usual placement, creating a visual inconsistency.
EB: The close button should consistently stay on the same line as the label, regardless of how small the view is. It should be positioned to the far right corner, maintaining a familiar and user-friendly layout.
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to the view containing the close button.
2. Resize the view to a smaller dimension.
3. Observe the close button's position in relation to the label, noting any movement downward.
4. Expected: The close button remains on the same line as the label, positioned to the far right corner.
